channel.title: Installing on Kubernetes on
channel.description: Recent content in Installing on Kubernetes on

item.title: Uninstall KubeSphere from Kubernetes
item.description:
You can uninstall KubeSphere from your existing Kubernetes cluster by using kubesphere-delete.sh. Copy it from the GitHub source file and execute this script on your local machine.

Warning

Uninstalling will remove KubeSphere from your Kubernetes cluster. This operation is irreversible and does not have any backup. Please be cautious with this operation.
